sentences.en: a rugged physique and a strong square jaw
sentences.cn: 强健的体格以及结实的方下巴

sentences.en: Grenville took another wallop plumb on the jaw.
sentences.cn: 格伦维尔又受了一拳，正中下巴。

sentences.en: He had a baby fuzz round his jaw.
sentences.cn: 他的下巴上长着细细的胡须。

sentences.en: He punched him on the jaw.
sentences.cn: 他一拳打在他的下巴上。

sentences.en: He thought for a moment, stroking his well-defined jaw.
sentences.cn: 他摸着自己轮廓分明的下巴想了一会儿。

sentences.en: His jaw jutted stubbornly forward; he would not be denied.
sentences.cn: 他固执地扬起下巴, 一副不肯罢休的样子.

sentences.en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
sentences.cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

sentences.en: Instead, she set her jaw grimly and waited in silence.
sentences.cn: 相反，她一脸严肃，面部紧绷，一声不吭地等着。

sentences.en: My fist glanced off his jaw.
sentences.cn: 我的拳头斜擦着他的下巴而过。

sentences.en: Patsy had to clench her jaw to suppress her anger.
sentences.cn: 帕奇只得咬紧牙关压住怒气。

sentences.en: She saw his jaw tighten and his face lose its colour.
sentences.cn: 她看见他的下巴绷紧，脸色煞白。

sentences.en: She struck her opponent a tremendous blow on the jaw.
She’s got a very determined jaw.

sentences.cn: 唾液顺着他的下巴流下来。
这部动画片简直精彩绝伦。

sentences.en: They took my pulse, took my blood pressure, and X-rayed my jaw.
sentences.cn: 他们给我量了脉搏、血压，还给我的下颌拍了X光片。

words.tran_cn: 狭窄的入口,危险的境遇

phrases.tran_cn: 迫近的危险，险境；鬼门关

trans.tran_en: one of the two bones that your teeth are in

trans.tran_cn: 闲谈，唠唠叨叨，喋喋不休，教训
